mixtral-8x7b_direct_sole-planning_result:
Sure, I'd be happy to help you plan your trip! Based on your preferences, here's a suggested itinerary for your seven-day trip from Minneapolis to Illinois, visiting three cities between March 8th to March 14th, 2022. The total cost of this itinerary is estimated to be around $6,300, which is well within your budget limit of $8,100.

Day 1: Minneapolis to Belleville
---------------------------------

* Self-driving from Minneapolis to Belleville (duration: 8 hours 48 mins, distance: 927 km, cost: 46)
* Accommodation in Belleville: Private room that is child-friendly for children under 10 (cost: $150/night for 2 nights, total: $300)

Day 2: Belleville
-----------------

* Self-driving from Belleville to Chicago (duration: 4 hours 36 mins, distance: 474 km, cost: 23)
* Accommodation in Chicago: Private room that is child-friendly for children under 10 (cost: $200/night for 2 nights, total: $400)

Day 3-4: Chicago
---------------

* Things to do and see in Chicago: Visit the Art Institute of Chicago ($70 for two tickets), Millennium Park ($0 entry fee), Navy Pier ($15 per person for a boat tour), and Shedd Aquarium ($80 for two tickets)
* Total cost: $165

Day 5: Chicago to Rockford
--------------------------

* Self-driving from Chicago to Rockford (duration: 1 hour 32 mins, distance: 143 km, cost: 7)
* Accommodation in Rockford: Private room that is child-friendly for children under 10 (cost: $120/night for 1 night, total: $120)

Day 6: Rockford
--------------

* Things to do and see in Rockford: Visit the Discovery Center Museum ($15 per person), Burpee Museum of Natural History ($30 for two tickets), and Nicholas Conservatory & Gardens ($20 for two tickets)
* Total cost: $75

Day 7: Rockford to Minneapolis
------------------------------

* Self-driving from Rockford to Minneapolis (duration: 5 hours 3 mins, distance: 540 km, cost: 27)

Total estimated cost of the trip: $6,300 ($8,100 budget - $1,800 for accommodations and transportation)

I hope this itinerary meets your needs and provides a fun and memorable trip for you and your travel companion!
